sourcesContent: import React from 'react' import { Card, Container, Row, Col, Button, ListGroup } from "react-bootstrap" import { withRouter } from 'react-router-dom'; const Workout = ({workout, history}) => { const handleSignUp = (name) => { history.push(`/workouts/sign/${workout._id}`) } return ( {workout.description} On {`${workout.date.substring(8,10)}.${workout.date.substring(5,7)}, ${workout.date.substring(11,16)} `} {`Price: ${workout.revenuePerClient} shekels`} Duration: { workout.duration > 1 ? `${workout.duration} hours` : `${workout.duration} hour` } { Number(workout.maxClients - workout.currentClients) === 0 ? 'Sold Out' : Number(workout.maxClients - workout.currentClients) === 1 ? '1 Place left!' : `${Number(workout.maxClients - workout.currentClients)} Places Left` } ) } export default withRouter(Workout)
